mapper.select: SELECT * FROM logging_slow WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY timestmp DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT * FROM logging_error WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY timestmp DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM logging_slow WHERE 1=1
AND timestmp >= #{startTime}
AND timestmp <= #{endTime}
AND trace_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{traceId}, '%')
AND user_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{userId}, '%')
AND ip_address LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ipAddress}, '%')
AND uri LIKE CONCAT('%', #{uri}, '%')
AND CAST(execute_result AS UNSIGNED) >= CAST(#{executeResult} AS UNSIGNED)

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM logging_error WHERE 1=1
AND timestmp >= #{startTime}
AND timestmp <= #{endTime}
AND trace_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{traceId}, '%')
AND user_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{userId}, '%')
AND ip_address LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ipAddress}, '%')
AND query LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query}, '%')
AND uri LIKE CONCAT('%', #{uri}, '%')

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM logging_event WHERE caller_method REGEXP '^(SELECT|INSERT|UPDATE|DELETE|CREATE|DROP|ALTER)[[:space:]]'
AND caller_method LIKE CONCAT('%', #{callerMethod}, '%')
